Documentation of the emma2 API¶

Reference¶

  • msm - Markov state models (emma2.msm)
  • io - Input and output for MSM related files (emma2.msm.io)
  • estimation - MSM estimation from data (emma2.msm.estimation)
  • analysis - MSM analysis functions (emma2.msm.analysis)
